name: Jumia launches Brands Festival campaign to promote authentic brands
description: Nigeria’s e-commerce platform, Jumia has launched the 2021 edition of the “Brands Festival” campaign targeted at promoting authentic products

name: Jumia’s Airtel Kenya partnership won’t end delivery payment problems
description: Jumia’s strategic overhaul continues with a partnership with Airtel Kenya allowing consumers to make pre-payments using Airtel Money.

name: Jumia-can-be-africas-amazon-by-enabling-third-party-e-commerce
description: The “Amazon of Africa” is trying to enable third-party e-commerce rather than sell more stuff

name: THE MOST CREATIVE OFFICE SPACES IN CAIRO
description: Oh what a wonderful workplace! It seems Egypt's leading designers mean business fuelling an office-space revolution...

name: Naivas, Jumia partner to offer home deliveries
description: Top retail chain Naivas Supermarket has partnered with e-commerce firm Jumia to enable shoppers in the vicinity of the retailer’s Prestige Plaza outlet to buy goods from the comfort of their homes.
